images.description: White version of the 'VŠE PRO STAVBY.CZ' company logo.
images.suggested_usage: Primary logo for header, footer, and branding materials. Consider an SVG for better scalability and smaller file size.

images.description: Image showcasing a completed construction project, likely a building facade or part of a structure, possibly in Tanvald as suggested by the original filename.
images.suggested_usage: Use in a project gallery, 'Our Work' section, or as a supporting image for a 'Fasades and Sanations' service description.

images.description: Image depicting a residential building, likely a 'rodinný dům' (family house) under construction or after reconstruction, implied by 'RDPO' alt text.
images.suggested_usage: Use to illustrate capabilities in new builds or renovations of family houses, possibly on a 'Services' page or in a project spotlight.
